AboutCategoriesContactTags

tailoryourbim.com is a place where you can find information for your BIM issues. We focus on finding solutions for modelling in Rhino and Autodesk Revit and OpenBIM workflows for Ifc models with diversive methods, including writing programs built on their APIs, RhinoCommon and RevitAPI, with languages, such as Python and FSharp and web applications with JavaScript and TypeScript. Have a look at the posts below. If you cannot find the right information for your issues there, contact us directly at info@tailoryourbim.com.

Dig in and have fun!
